items.title: Save $271 while expanding your arsenal with this 8-tool Greenworks combo kit at $479 (best price of the year)
items.summary:
Update 2/25: Amazon has dropped the price further on this comprehensive 8-tool Greenworks combo kit to $478.79 shipped.

Over at Amazon, you can bolster your power tool arsenal with Greenworks’ 24V 8-tool Combo Kit that comes with a 4.0Ah battery and two 2.0Ah power bank batteries at $512.99 shipped right now, beating out its direct website pricing by $237. The direct website is keeping it listed at its full $750 price, which we’ve seen cascade down with consecutive discounts over the new year – first to $600, then to $570, and now dropping even further. While we have seen this bundle go lower in 2025, you’re getting a really solid $237 markdown that lands it at the best price yet in 2026.
